1.text: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, before you were born I set you apart.

2.text: For you created my inmost being; you knit me together in my mother's womb.

5.text: Children are a heritage from the Lord, offspring a reward from him.

10.text: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.

15.text: The Lord your God is with you, the Mighty Warrior who saves.

20.text: You will go out in joy and be led forth in peace.

25.text: My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.

30.text: But blessed is the one who trusts in the Lord, whose confidence is in him.

35.text: The Lord himself goes before you and will be with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.

40.text: For nothing is impossible with God.
